eye.inform.qr.tip: Please scan the QR code with the mobile client of Bilibili
eye.inform.qr.error: QR code error, please refresh and scan again
eye.inform.qr.expired: QR code expired, please refresh and scan again
eye.inform.qr.not_confirm: Please confirm the scan page on your phone
eye.options.tooltip.super_eye: After turning on night vision will be turned on.
eye.options.tooltip.black_belt: Show black belt effect after opening.
eye.options.tooltip.bili_option: Log in to Bilibili, and if you click it when you have logged in, you can logout.
eye.options.tooltip.dan_mu_usage: Enter / eye sendBiliLive in the chat bar of the game interface, and then enter your own DanMu. Press enter to send successfully.
eye.widget.tooltip.login: Warning: Although this module will not upload the login cookie to other places, it does not guarantee that the cookie in memory will be used by malware. If you are not sure, you can click the source release page above to view the source code.
